naslov: Luksuzna vila uz more, Sumartin, otok Brač (prodaja)
opis: LOKACIJA !!! Prodaje se novosagrađena, moderna vila na otoku Braču, Sumartin, na samo 50ak koraka od mora, a izgrađena je na parceli od 1441 m2. Kuća je modernije arhitekture, u završnoj fazi uređenja, ima 4 etaže (podrum+3) i ukupnu površinu veću od 500 m2. Pogled na more sa svih etaža, a sa velike terase mansarde pruža se neometan, prekrasan pogled prema jugu. Svaka nadzemna etaža vile (3) može funkcionirati kao etažna cjelina - trosoban stan. U prizemlju je izgrađen i manji apartman za goste. Pristup automobilom  u dvorište, parking za više vozila (+ podzemna garaža), izgrađena konstrukcija bazena uz kuću, uređena šetnica oko vile, moderna arhitektura, staklene ograde terasa, EPS toplinska fasada, kvalitetan višekomorni PVC sa troslojnim staklima, električne rolete, instalacije klime i grijanja, antenski sustav, rostfrei ograde stubišta, podovi kamen, svaka etaža ima više kupaonica (svaka soba) ...i dr. Vlasništvo čisto - bez zabilježbi. Cijena dogovor. Prodaja direktno od vlasnika, pravna osoba - prijenos porezne obaveze. LOCATION !!! A newly built, modern villa is for sale on the island of Brač, Sumartin, just 50 steps from the sea, and is built on a plot of 1441 m2. The house has a modern architecture, is in the final stage of renovation, has 4 floors (basement + 3) and a total area of more than 500 m2. Sea views from all floors, and from the large attic terrace there is an unobstructed, beautiful view to the south. Each above-ground floor of the villa (3) can function as a single unit - a three-bedroom apartment. A smaller guest apartment has also been built on the ground floor. Car access to the yard, parking for several vehicles (+ underground garage), built pool structure next to the house, arranged walkway around the villa, modern architecture, glass terrace railings, EPS thermal facade, high-quality multi-chamber PVC with triple-layered glass, electric shutters, air conditioning and heating installations, antenna system, stainless steel staircase railings, stone floors, each floor has multiple bathrooms (each room) ...etc. Clear ownership - no records. Price negotiable. Direct sale from the owner, legal entity - transfer of tax liability.
adresa_agencije: Adresa:1 Luka 4, 10040 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
